content: In the past few days i have noticed unusual things like this user in the screenshot. New users come to the forum and start creating new topics right after a few days. Just look how many topics this user created in a single day and he even begged for merit in one of his topic. Is there someone who spreads misinformation about any giveaway in the forum for creating new topic!(This isn't a serious question)   I know they are newbie and we can not expect anything super helpful from them, but they should at least read the forum rules first....................................Edit: That users profile link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3573102

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: From one-line posts to a wall of texts that still make no sense because they're too tiring to read, This is probably another user who read, was told, or somehow found out about the money-making opportunities through the forum, signature, and bounty campaigns but was faced with the challenge of earning merit. Somehow he thinks that he's smart and everyone else is a fool; otherwise, he wouldn't believe that he could possibly earn merit through plagiarism and AI content. This is another example of the successful implementation of the merit system; otherwise, this user would simply rank up through activity in a few months and start applying to bounty and signature campaigns, which I doubt the latter would accept.
